snippet: St. Louis Circuit Judge Steven Ohmer declared the ordinance invalid and banned the city from enforcing it.
abstract: Missouri Judge Steven Ohmer strikes down ordinance to raise minimum wage in St Louis to $8.25 an hour; legislation would have made city only one with wage higher than state minimum of $7.65 an hour.
lead_paragraph: St. Louis Circuit Judge Steven Ohmer declared the ordinance invalid and banned the city from enforcing it.

headline.main: Missouri: Judge Strikes Down Law Increasing St. Louis’s Minimum Wage
headline.print_headline: Missouri: Judge Strikes Down Law Increasing St. Louis’s Minimum Wage
